owl:Ontology.dc:title: Non-Verbal Theatre Ontology
Ontologie für nonverbales Theater
owl:Ontology.terms:abstract: Linked-Data Ontologie für die Modellierung von Informationen über Objekte und Ereignisse des kulturellen Erbes aus dem Bereich der darstellenden Künste mit Fokus auf nonverbale Formen von Theater. Die Entwicklung der Ontologie is Teil des Digitalisierungsprojekts "NONVERBALES THEATER IM EHEMALIGEN OSTTEIL BERLINS 1970-1991" an der Mediathek für Tanz und Theater am deutschen Zentrum des Internationales Theaterinstituts. Das Projekt wird gefördert durch das Förderprogramm Digitalisierung von Objekten des kulturellen Erbes Berlin des Forschungs- und Kompetenzzentrums Digitalisierung Berlin (digiS).

Linked-Data ontology for modelling cultural heritage information in the domain of performing arts focused on non-verbal form of theatre. The ontology development is part of the "NONVERBALES THEATER IM EHEMALIGEN OSTTEIL BERLINS 1970-1991" digitisation project at the Media Library for Dance and Theatre of the German Centre of the International Theatre Institute. The project is funded by the Förderprogramm Digitalisierung von Objekten des kulturellen Erbes Berlin of the Forschungs- und Kompetenzzentrum Digitalisierung Berlin (digiS).
owl:Ontology.terms:publisher: Media Library for Dance and Theatre / ITI Germany
Mediathek für Tanz und Theater / ITI Deutschland
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Non-Verbal Theatre Ontology
Ontologie für nonverbales Theater

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has extent
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes the extent of a resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has format
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes the format of a resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has medium
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects to the medium of a resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has predecessor
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Connects or describes two resources in which one resource precedes the other.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has provenance
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects to the provenance of a resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has publisher
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes the publisher of a resource or connects the resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as publisher.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has rights holder
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes the rights holder of a resource or connects the resource to an agent who holds rights to the resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has source
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects to the source of a resource.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has successor
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Connects or describes two resources in which one resource succeeds the other.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: has type
owl:AnnotationProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects to the type of a resource.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has assistant director
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as assistant director.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has cast
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who was part of its cast.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has casting agent
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who was responsible for casting.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has member
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects the relation between a resource and other resources that are members of it (e.g. the members of a artist group).

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains audible reference to
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource it contains an audible reference to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains audiovisual reference to
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource it contains an audiovisual reference to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains reference to
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource it contains any kind of reference to.
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:scopeNote: Hier: Referenz kann in der Aufnahme oder als Beschriftung vorkommen, wenn nicht klar, containsreference, wenn klarer, tiefere Ebenen nutzen

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains textual reference to
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource it contains a textual reference to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contains visual reference to
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource it contains a visual reference to.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: happened at place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects an event to the place it happened at.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has acrobat
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as acrobat.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has actor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as actor.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has adaptor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as adaptor.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has author
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has choreographer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as choreographer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has cinematographer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as cinematographer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has clown
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as clown.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has composer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has concept originator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as concept originator.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has content match
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource with matching content. A shorthand property for connecting a resource to another resource with partly or fully matching contents

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has contributor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource in any way.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has costume designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as costume designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has creator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as creator.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has dancer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as dancer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has digital version
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a physical object with a digital version of itself.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has director
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as director.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has dramaturge
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as dramaturge.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has editor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as editor.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has homepage
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects to a homepage of an agent.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has illustrator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as illustrator.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has information carrier
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects an information object with a physical or digital object it is represented on.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has layouter
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as layouter.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has light designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as light designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has make up artist
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as make up artist.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has mask designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as mask designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has mediator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as creator.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has mime
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as mime.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has musician
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as musician.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has participant
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as participant.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has performer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as performer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has photographer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as photographer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has playwright
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as playwright.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has producer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as producer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has programme director
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to a festival or event through curating or directing the programme of the event.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has publishing place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to the place it was published at.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has puppet designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as puppet designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has recordist
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as recordist.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has related place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to a place it is related to in any way.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has related website
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects to a related website of an agent or a resource.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has residence
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects an agent to its place of residency.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has season
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Describes the season in which a performing arts production was performed.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has set builder
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as set builder.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has set designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as set designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has singer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as singer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has sound designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as sound designer.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has speaker
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as speaker.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has surtitle author
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as author of surtitles.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has surtitle translator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as translator of surtitles.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has technician
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as technician.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has translator
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent who contributed to the resource as translator.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: video designer
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to an agent responsible for its video design.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is part of
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to another resource of which it is a part of.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is residence of
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a place to an agent that resides at this place.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: occured at time
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects an event to the timespan it occured at.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: originated at place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Connects a resource to the location it originated at.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: begins at time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the begin date/point in time of a time span.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ends at time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the end date/point in time of a time span.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has address
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the address of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has condition
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes or connects to the condition of a resource (e.g. the condition of a physical object or a digital file).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has date
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes a singular date/point in time.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has date of birth
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the date of birth of an agent.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has date of death
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the date of death of an agent.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has description
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: A general description of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has dimensions
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the dimensions of a resource (e.g. the condition of a physical object or a digital file).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has family name
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the family name of an agent.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has first name
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the first name of an agent.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has first performance date
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: A shorthand property for describing the first performance date of a resource (e.g. a performing arts production).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has identifier
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes one or more alternative identifiers of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has ISBN
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the ISBN of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has labeling back
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the labeling of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has labeling back
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the labeling on the back of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has labeling front
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the labeling on the front of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has language
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the language associated to a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has last performance date
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: A shorthand property for describing the last performance date of a resource (e.g. a performing arts production).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has rights
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes one or more rights statements of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has subtitle
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the subtitle of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has table of contents
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the table of contents of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has title
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes the title of a resource.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: was created at time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes a singular date/point in time at which a resource was created.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: was issued at time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes a singular date/point in time at which a resource was issued.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Agent
Agent
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises all agents such as persons or institutions.
owl:Class.skos:example: Burkhart Seidemann, Pantomimen-Theater vom Prenzlauer Berg

owl:Class.rdfs:label: City
Stadt
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises cities dependent on time and/or geopolitics.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collection
Sammlung
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises (named) resource collections in arbitrary order.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Country
Land
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises countries dependent on time and/or geopolitics.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Object
Digitales Objekt
owl:Class.skos:definition: The digital representation of the contents a medium. Digital information carrier.
owl:Class.skos:example: A specific digital file with name IMG-001.tif, VID-001.avi

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ereignis
Event
owl:Class.skos:example: A performance of 'Hamlet', a workshop regarding a specific acting technique, an exhibition about an actor/actress
owl:Class.skos:scopeNote: Used specifically for events in the realm of performing arts.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Information Object
Informationsobjekt
owl:Class.skos:definition: Conceptual representation of the contents a medium captured by a physical or digital (archival) object. The same information object can be captured in multiple pyhsical or digital objects (e.g. a magazine edition). Also one physical object can carry multiple information objects (e.g. multiple movies in a single video tape).
owl:Class.skos:example: Aufnahme von Aufführung, Inhalt von Programmheft X

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Organisation
Organization
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises all agents that are organizations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Festival
Festival
owl:Class.skos:example: The biannual international theatre festival 'Theater der Welt'
owl:Class.skos:scopeNote: Used specifically for festivals in the realm of performing arts.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Festival Edition
Festivalausgabe
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises all singular instances or editions of a Festival.
owl:Class.skos:example: The 2017 edition of the biannual theatre festival 'Theater der Welt', held in Hamburg, Germany
owl:Class.skos:scopeNote: Used specifically for festival editions in the realm of performing arts.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group/Ensemble/Company
Gruppe/Ensemble/Company
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises ensembles and similar groups in the realm of performing arts.
owl:Class.skos:example: DT Ensemble, Berliner Improvisations Trio, Pantomimen-Theater vom Prenzlauer Berg

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Aufführungsort
Performing Arts Location
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises locations that were or are used for performing arts.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Production
Produktion
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises productions that were or are performed in performing arts events.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person
Person
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises all agents that are persons

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical Object
Physisches Objekt
owl:Class.skos:definition: Physical representation of the contents a medium. Physical information carrier.
owl:Class.skos:example: Videokassette mit Aufnahme von Aufführung, Programmheft X

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Timespan
Zeitspanne
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class comprises timespans of any length.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has first edition
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Describes or points to the first edition of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has first localized edition
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Describes or points to the first localized edition of a resource.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has name
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Describes the name of an agent.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has photo studio
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Connects a resource to a photo studio that contributed to its creation.
